mapper.select: SELECT CA.COUNSEL_APPLICATION_NO, CA.COUNSEL_CONTENT, CA.COUNSEL_DATE, CA.STATUS, CA.REFUSAL, CA.CREATE_DATE, CA.UPDATE_DATE, CA.COUNSEL_MEMBER_NO, CA.COUNSELOR_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME AS MEMBER_NAME FROM COUNSEL_APPLICATION CA JOIN MEMBER M ON CA.COUNSEL_MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY CA.CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COUNSEL_APPLICATION ( COUNSEL_APPLICATION_NO, COUNSEL_CONTENT, COUNSEL_DATE, COUNSELOR_NO, COUNSEL_MEMBER_NO, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_CANO.NEXTVAL, #{consultAppContent}, #{consultTime}, #{consultMemberNo}, #{consultAppMemberNo}, #{status} )
